Here's an old link on the topic sans mention of pictures:
https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/design/topic/6429/any-suggestions-for-kid-appropriate-games

Posts.EditableText:
I helped my niece write one based off a story she wrote...
It's short but interesting...
There are (a few) pictures in the map boxes. I was adding them when I forgot about this project.
It's playable as it is.
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/raytcm-ds0azglg0xfm39w/the-lost-unicorn
